schema.description:
自定义配置项数据，JSON数组，包含以下字段：
- `path`：配置项路径
- `name`：配置项名称
- `value`：配置值

Message.description: 响应消息，若成功请求为success

ResultMessage.example: Parsing configuration values fails. Please make sure the value is consistent with the declared type. Currently supported types are: String, Integer, List, Boolean, Float, Json.

OptionDescription.example: This port will be used as the HTTP service port after the application is launched, and ports from 1024 to 65535 can be used.

Code.description: 响应代码，若成功请求为OK

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "Code": "OK", "Message": "success", "RequestId": "170E6BDE-8ACA-4013-B1D6-F0C2AAD*****", "ConfigValidationResults": { "ConfigValidationResult": [ { "ResultMessage": "Parsing configuration values fails. Please make sure the value is consistent with the declared type. Currently supported types are: String, Integer, List, Boolean, Float, Json.", "OptionName": "port", "PathName": "application.option", "ResultSeverity": "Error", "ConfigOption": { "RegexDesc": "\"\"", "MaxValue": 65535, "EditorType": "{\\\"component\\\":\\\"NumberPicker\\\",\\\"props\\\":{}}", "MinValue": 1024, "OptionLabel": "Server Port", "MaxLength": -1, "DefaultValue": "8080", "RegexPattern": "\"\"", "OptionDescription": "This port will be used as the HTTP service port after the application is launched, and ports from 1024 to 65535 can be used.", "ChangeSeverity": "NoInterruption", "OptionName": "port", "PathName": "application.option", "HiddenOption": false, "ValueType": "Integer", "MinLength": 0, "ValueOptions": "\"\"", "ReadonlyOption": false } } ] } }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" Error 1024 Integer {"component":"NumberPicker","props":{}} 8080 65535 application.option port Server Port NoInterruption false -1 false 0 This port will be used as the HTTP service port after the application is launched, and ports from 1024 to 65535 can be used. Parsing configuration values fails. Please make sure the value is consistent with the declared type. Currently supported types are: String, Integer, List, Boolean, Float, Json. application.option port success 6112EBD9-E35E-4D98-91D5-5E302F7***** OK ","errorExample":""}]
title: 验证一个配置的设置有效性
summary: 来验证一个配置的设置有效性。
